title: Text Cleaning & Normalization
---

```{python}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
import re
import pandas as pd

# example cleaner
def clean_ar(text):
    if not isinstance(text, str):
        return ''
    text = re.sub(r"[\u0617-\u061A\u064B-\u0652]", "", text)  # remove diacritics
    text = re.sub(r"\s+", " ", text).strip()
    return text
```
